summary: During one peculiar night, the lives of several interconnected people are changed, as they rapidly experience love, disappointment, joy, greed and remorse.
cast: Sergej Trifunovic|Marija Karan|Nebojsa Glogovac|Boris Milivojevic|Gordan Kicic|Nikola Vujovic|Lazar Strugar|Miodrag Fisekovic|Mladen Andrejevic|Boris Komnenic|Srdjan Miletic|Nikola Djuricko|Olga Odanovic|Petar Kralj|Milos Samolov|Ana Markovic|Predrag Bjelac|Goran Danicic|Ana Bretsnajder|Dragomir Cumic|Zoran Cvijanovic|Ljiljana Dragutinovic|Boris Isakovic|Almir Kurt|Aleksandar Sapic|Tomislav Trifunovic|Marko Vasovic
title: Kad porastem bicu Kengur
